name: Visuals
tagline: "There is magic in graphs."  ~ Henry D. Hubbard
body: ### West Nile Virus Cases in California A zoomable, stacked bar chart and a cartogram show geographic and temporal trends. Implemented in D3. ### n-Grams in Google Local Reviews Compares the ranking of n-grams between two different subsets of Google Local reviews. Implemented in D3.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
